text: Laure Killing (12 January 1959 â€“ 18 November 2019) was a French actress and comedian. She appeared in more than fifty movies from 1986 until her death. In movies, she was known for her roles in Before the Winter Chill, The Teddy Bear, Love After Love, My Nights Are More Beautiful Than Your Days and Beyond Therapy. Killing died on 18 November 2019 of cancer at the age of 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:French comedians Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors
title: Laure Killing
